Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-9648 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.2-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-9648 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.2-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 18.2.2-11, affected by CVE-2025-9648
